languages.text: "Соломон, почему ты так уверен, что это именно тот, кого ты ищешь?"

traits.locale_text: "Соломон, почему ты так уверен, что это именно тот, кого ты ищешь?"

languages.text: "Solomorne, why are you so certain that this is the man you're seeking?"
languages.original_text: "Соломон, почему ты так уверен, что это именно тот, кого ты ищешь?"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, why are you so certain that this is the man you're seeking?"
"Solomorne, why are you so certain that this is the man you're seeking?"
"Solomorne, why are you so certain that this is the man you're seeking?"
"Solomorne, why are you so certain that this is the man you're seeking?"
"Solomorne, why are you so certain that this is the man you're seeking?"

languages.text: 「ソロモーン、君はなぜ、そいつが君の探している男だとそんなに確信しているんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, why are you so certain that this is the man you're seeking?"

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーン、君はなぜ、そいつが君の探している男だとそんなに確信しているんだ？」

languages.text: "Bu adamın aradığın adam olduğundan nasıl bu kadar eminsin Solomorne?"
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, why are you so certain that this is the man you're seeking?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu adamın, aradığın adam olduğundan nasıl bu kadar eminsin Solomorne?"

languages.text: «Solomorne, ¿cómo está tan seguro de que este hombre es a quien busca?».
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, why are you so certain that this is the man you're seeking?"

traits.locale_text: «Solomorne, ¿cómo está tan seguro de que este hombre es a quien busca?».

languages.text: “索罗蒙，你怎么这么确定他就是你要抓的那个人？”
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, why are you so certain that this is the man you're seeking?"

traits.locale_text: “索罗蒙，你怎么这么确定他就是你要抓的那个人？”

languages.text: « Solomorne, comment pouvez-vous être sûr qu'il s'agit bien de l'homme que vous cherchez ? »
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, why are you so certain that this is the man you're seeking?"

traits.locale_text: « Solomorne, comment pouvez-vous être sûr qu'il s'agit bien de l'homme que vous cherchez ? »

languages.text: "Solomorne, warum seid Ihr Euch so sicher, dass das der Mann ist, den Ihr sucht?"
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, why are you so certain that this is the man you're seeking?"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, warum seid Ihr Euch so sicher, dass das der Mann ist, den Ihr sucht?"
